byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and MATTHEW ROSENBERG

abstract: Hackers post hundreds of emails from low-level Democratic operative Ian Mellul containing detailed schedules and movements of Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr, first lady Michelle Obama and Hillary Clinton during campaign fund-raisers and political events; emails include contacts for Secret Service agents and Social Security numbers of donors; documents posted reveal extent to which White House officials, Clinton campaign staff and Secret Service agents have exchanged sensitive information with people using personal email accounts.

headline.print_headline: Email Hack Details Movements of Clinton, Biden and Michelle Obama
headline.main: Email Hack Details Movements of Joe Biden, Michelle Obama and Hillary Clinton

snippet: Emails from a Democratic operative posted online reveal not only detailed schedules of officials but also personal information of donors and Secret Service agents....
lead_paragraph: Emails from a Democratic operative posted online reveal not only detailed schedules of officials but also personal information of donors and Secret Service agents.
